Page.title: Gabriel Garus
Page.description: Front end focused developer. Experienced in react/redux environments. Good proficiency in CSS/HTML. Eperience in WordPress development
Page.raw:
---
title: Gabriel Garus
layout: index
description:
  "Front end focused developer. Experienced in react/redux environments.
  Good proficiency in CSS/HTML.
  Eperience in WordPress development"
---

Page.content: function expanseItem(e){var t=e.querySelector("button");var n=e.querySelector(".item-info");t.addEventListener("click",function(){n.classList.toggle("open");e.classList.toggle("open")})}function expanseItems(){var e=document.querySelectorAll(".expertise-item");if(!e||!e.length){return null}e.forEach(expanseItem)}function clipBoardEmail(){var t=document.getElementById("myEmail");if(!t){return null}var n=t.querySelector("button");var i=t.querySelector("p").innerHTML;n.addEventListener("click",function(){var e=document.createElement("input");e.setAttribute("type","text");e.value=i;e.style.opacity=0;t.appendChild(e);e.select();e.setSelectionRange(0,99999);document.execCommand("copy");t.removeChild(e);n.classList.add("hidden");n.innerHTML="-- email copied! --"})}function ffDomLoadedScripts(){expanseItems();clipBoardEmail()}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",ffDomLoadedScripts);
Page.more: function expanseItem(e){var t=e.querySelector("button");var n=e.querySelector(".item-info");t.addEventListener("click",function(){n.classList.toggle("open");e.classList.toggle("open")})}function expanseItems(){var e=document.querySelectorAll(".expertise-item");if(!e||!e.length){return null}e.forEach(expanseItem)}function clipBoardEmail(){var t=document.getElementById("myEmail");if(!t){return null}var n=t.querySelector("button");var i=t.querySelector("p").innerHTML;n.addEventListener("click",function(){var e=document.createElement("input");e.setAttribute("type","text");e.value=i;e.style.opacity=0;t.appendChild(e);e.select();e.setSelectionRange(0,99999);document.execCommand("copy");t.removeChild(e);n.classList.add("hidden");n.innerHTML="-- email copied! --"})}function ffDomLoadedScripts(){expanseItems();clipBoardEmail()}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",ffDomLoadedScripts);

Page.content: .cf{clear:both;*zoom:1}.cf:before,.cf:after{content:"";display:table}.cf:after{clear:both}.left{float:left;width:50%}.right{float:right;width:50%}.center{text-align:center}@keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-moz-keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-webkit-keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-ms-keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-o-keyframes fadein{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}.chevron{height:14px;width:14px;overflow:visible}.chevron::before{border-style:solid;border-width:2px 2px 0 0;content:'';display:inline-block;height:0.45em;left:0.15em;position:relative;top:40%;transform:rotate(-45deg);vertical-align:top;width:0.45em}.chevron.right:before{left:0;transform:rotate(45deg)}.chevron.bottom:before{top:0;transform:rotate(135deg)}.chevron.left:before{left:0.25em;transform:rotate(-135deg)}html,body{overflow-y:visible}*,*:before,*:after{-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}body{background-color:#fefefe;color:#666666;font-family:"Helvetica", "Calibri", sans-serif;width:100%;padding:0;margin:0;position:relative}h1,h2{margin:0}h2{margin-bottom:24px}h3{margin-bottom:24px}.content{padding:12px;max-width:666px;margin:0 auto;position:relative}a{color:#666666}.ball,.divider:after,.divider:before{display:block;border:solid 1px #666;width:30px;height:30px;border-radius:100%;position:absolute;left:24px;bottom:0;transform:translateY(50%);background-color:#fefefe}.divider{border-bottom:solid 1px #666;width:100%;display:block;position:relative;margin:60px auto 80px auto}.divider:after,.divider:before{content:"";left:50%;transform:translate(-50%, 50%);width:20px;height:20px}.divider:before{border:solid 10px #fefefe;width:60px}@media (min-width: 501px){.mobile-only{display:none}}@media (max-width: 500px){.tablet-only{display:none}}@media (min-width: 1000px){.tablet-only{display:none}}@media (max-width: 1000px){.desktop-only{display:none}}.line{width:100%;display:block;border-bottom:solid 1px #666}.main-header{width:100%;overflow:visible;max-width:100%;margin-bottom:24px;border-bottom:solid 1px #666;position:relative;background-color:#f6f6f6}.main-header h1{width:100%;font-size:24px;text-align:right}@media (min-width: 440px){.main-header h1{font-size:36px}}.main-header h2{font-size:12px;text-align:right}@media (min-width: 440px){.main-header h2{font-size:18px}}.main-header .magic-hat{position:absolute;bottom:-40px;right:18px;opacity:0.2;transform:rotate(35deg)}.main-header .magic-hat svg{width:30px;height:auto;fill:#666}@media (min-width: 266px){.main-header .magic-hat{transform:rotate(0deg);right:auto;bottom:auto;left:14%;top:12px}}@media (min-width: 300px){.main-header .magic-hat{top:24px}.main-header .magic-hat svg{width:40px}}@media (min-width: 440px){.main-header .magic-hat{opacity:0.1}.main-header .magic-hat svg{width:60px}}.footer{border-top:solid 1px #666;margin-top:48px;background-color:#f6f6f6}.footer .content{padding:24px}.footer h3{font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;color:#999}.footer .social a{color:#999;margin-right:12px;text-decoration:none}.footer .ball,.footer .divider:after,.footer .divider:before{bottom:auto;top:0;transform:translateY(-50%);right:24px;left:auto}.item-info{max-height:0;overflow:hidden;transition:all 0.2s}.item-info.open{max-height:300px;transition:all 0.5s}.expertise-item{width:100%;overflow:visible;border-bottom:dotted 1px #666;border-left:dotted 1px #666;position:relative}.expertise-item button{background:transparent;text-align:left;font-size:20px;width:100%;border:none;color:#666;padding:24px;cursor:pointer;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.expertise-item button:focus{outline:none}.expertise.other .expertise-item button{padding:12px}.expertise-item .ball,.expertise-item .divider:after,.expertise-item .divider:before{left:-6px;width:12px;height:12px;z-index:5;top:0;bottom:auto;transform:translateY(-50%);transition:all 0.2s}.expertise-item.open .ball:not(.last),.expertise-item.open .divider:not(.last):after,.expertise-item.open .divider:not(.last):before{transition:all 0.2s;background-color:#ccc}.ball.last,.last.divider:after,.last.divider:before{top:auto;bottom:0;transform:translateY(50%)}.expertise{list-style-type:none;position:relative;padding:0 10px}.item-info ul{padding-bottom:12px}.item-info ul li{padding:8px 0}.envelope{width:40px;height:25px;border:1px dashed #666;position:relative;-webkit-border-radius:1px;-moz-border-radius:1px;border-radius:1px;overflow:hidden;margin:0 auto}.envelope:before{border-bottom:1px dashed #666;position:absolute;display:block;content:"";top:6.3px;left:-2.5px;width:25px;height:1px;-webkit-transform:rotate(35deg);-moz-transform:rotate(35deg);-ms-transform:rotate(35deg);-o-transform:rotate(35deg);transform:rotate(35deg)}.envelope:after{border-bottom:1px dashed #666;position:absolute;display:block;content:'';top:6.3px;right:-2.5px;width:25px;height:1px;-webkit-transform:rotate(-35deg);-moz-transform:rotate(-35deg);-ms-transform:rotate(-35deg);-o-transform:rotate(-35deg);transform:rotate(-35deg)}.contact-email{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:nowrap}@media (max-width: 352px){.contact-email{flex-wrap:wrap}.contact-email .email-copy{width:100%;flex-basis:100%;flex-shrink:0}}.email-link,.email-text{margin-right:12px}.email-text{font-size:14px}@media (min-width: 500px){.email-text{font-size:16px}}.email-copy{color:silver;border:solid 1px silver;padding:8px;border-radius:3px;overflow:hidden;width:auto;margin-left:auto}.email-copy.hidden{transition:all 0.3s;opacity:0.5}.cta-links{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-evenly;flex-wrap:wrap;margin-bottom:48px}@media (max-width: 340px){.cta-links a{margin-bottom:24px}}.linkedin-link{width:40px;height:40px;border-radius:5px;overflow:hidden}.svg.linkedin{width:40px;height:40px;fill:#666}.svg.linkedin:hover{fill:gray}.cv-link{height:40px;color:#fefefe;background-color:#666;border-radius:5px;padding:0 15px;line-height:40px;text-decoration:none}.cv-link:hover{background-color:gray}.gh-link{width:40px;height:40px;border-radius:5px;overflow:hidden;margin:0 12px}.gh-link svg{fill:#666}.gh-link svg:hover{fill:gray}.about{color:#666;text-align:center;margin-bottom:48px}.about .text{font-size:24px;padding-left:12px}.about p{text-align:left;line-height:1.5;font-size:14px}.about img{width:80%;margin:0 auto;height:auto;border-radius:6px;margin-bottom:40px}.about .quotation{max-width:90%;border-top:solid 1px #dedede;margin:0 auto}.about .quote{font-size:12px;text-align:right;opacity:0.7;padding-right:5px}.about .info{margin-bottom:52px}.aboutMain{display:block}@media (min-width: 400px){.aboutMain{display:flex;align-items:flex-start;justify-content:space-between}.aboutMain .info{flex-basis:60%}.aboutMain img{flex-basis:30%;width:30%}}
